Course overview for Spatial Microsimulation course in Seville, 7^th^ - 9^th^ November.

## Day 1 (9:30 to 17:30 with one hour break)

- [Introduction to spatial microsimulation in R](http://robinlovelace.net/spatial-microsim-book/slides/introduction.pdf) (RL 09:30 - 10:30)
    - Course overview, aims and objectives (RL 9:30 - 10:00)
    - Go-round of participants: course aspirations (RL 10:00 - 10:30)

- What is Spatial Microsimulation and its applications (with an emphasis on EU projects) (10:30 - 11:30)
    - Agriculture (RL)
    - Wealth distribution (RL)
    - Transport (MD - 20 min)
    
- [Using R and RStudio](http://rpubs.com/RobinLovelace/146447) for spatial microsimulation (RL 11:30 - 13:00 See book appendix)
    - Project management
    - GitHub
    - The RStudio Graphical User Interface (GUI)
    - Using R

- [Creating spatial microdata in R](http://robinlovelace.net/spatial-microsim-book/slides/spatial-microdata-in-r.html) (MD 14:00 - 17:30)
    - Loading the data
    - Preparing the data 
    - Reweighting procedures
  
## Day 2

- [Applying the methods of IPF and Combinatorial Optimisation](https://github.com/Robinlovelace/spatial-microsim-book/blob/master/slides/Applying-IPF-and-CO.Rmd) (9:30 - 12:00)
    - Internal and External Validation (MD)
    - Population synthesis with integerisation (MD)
    - Introduction to Combinatorial Optimisation (MD)

- [simPop](https://github.com/Robinlovelace/spatial-microsim-book/blob/master/slides/simpop-intro.Rmd) (RL 12:00 - 13:00)

- Spatial data with R (14:00 - 16:00)
    - [Spatial data classes](http://rpubs.com/RobinLovelace/217921) (30 min)
    - Practical working on the [Creating-maps-in-R](https://github.com/Robinlovelace/Creating-maps-in-R) (45 min Q & A)
    - [Visualisation](https://github.com/Robinlovelace/Creating-maps-in-R/blob/master/vignettes/vspd-base-shiny.md) (30 min)
    - [Simple features](https://github.com/edzer/sfr) (**sf** package) (15 min if time)



## Day 3


- Related topics (MD 9:30 - 10:30)
  - Spatial micro-data for agent-based models 
  - Spatial microsimulation without micro-data 
  - Adding the household information 
  - Choice of data and methods 

- Practical application (MD - 10:45 - 12:30)
    
- [Interactive mapping](https://github.com/Robinlovelace/Creating-maps-in-R/blob/master/vignettes/vspd-base-shiny.md) with **tmap**, **leaflet** and **shiny** (if time) (RL 12:30 - 13:00)

- Apply what you've learn on your own data (14:00 - 16:45)

- Conclusion to the course (16:45 - 17:00)
